pages.text: The ability to administer first-aid is must-have knowledge for any caretaker of mythical creatures. There are many hazards that can be encountered during riding activities and it is essential that a good equerry know how to provide treatment in a timely manner.$(br2)

$(br2)Basic first aid techniques include splash-able health potions and food items.$(br2)Mounts may also be treated by allowing them to rest, as they will slowly regain health when they have the opportunity to sleep.
